text: aur unhe un ke nabi ne faramaaya ke Allah ta’ala ne taalooth ko tumhaara badshaah bana diya hai, to kehne lage ke bhala us ki hum par kaise hukumath ho sakti hai? us se to bahuth zyaada haqdaar badshaahath ke hum hai, us ko to maali kushaadgi bhi nahi di gayi, nabi ne farmaaya suno, Allah ta’ala ne isi ko tum par barguzida kiya hai aur ose ilmi aur jismaani bartari bhi ata farmaayi hai, baath ye hai ke Allah jise chaahe apna mulk de, Allah ta’ala kushaadgi waala aur ilm waala hai
